critique: The document is a formal executive order amending a previous order related to wage and price controls during the transition to a peacetime economy after World War II. The language is legalistic and bureaucratic. There is no strong emotional content. A score of 1 is appropriate for all emotions except perhaps a slight sense of hope or optimism (joy) that the transition will be managed effectively, but even that is very muted. Therefore, I will assign initial scores of 1 for all emotions. After further consideration, I will keep the scores at 1, as there is no clear indication of any specific emotion being conveyed.
